alert.note: Alert for Lee (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 02 at 7:59PM EST until January 03 at 2:05PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. For the Kentucky River...including Whitesburg, Hazard, Jackson, Oneida, Booneville, Heidelberg, Ravenna...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River at Heidelberg. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM EST Sunday the stage was 22.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The river crested at 23.4 feet around 9:45 AM EST this morning. - Forecast...The river has crested and is expected to fall below flood stage by early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. The next statement will be issued 8 AM EST.
